on paper.translation[0].definitions[0].d: if you put ideas or information on paper, you write them down
on paper.translation[0].definitions[0].e: You need to get some of these thoughts down on paper.
on paper.translation[0].definitions[1].d: if something seems true on paper, it seems to be true as an idea, but may not be true in a real situation
on paper.translation[0].definitions[1].e: It’s a nice idea on paper, but you’ll never get it to work.
